mapper.insert: INSERT INTO AUCTION VALUES(AUCTION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{auction_type_no}, #{nickname}, 1, #{product_name}, #{auction_title}, #{auction_content}, #{product_price}, #{bidding_unit}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{endDateStr},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),0, #{product_img}, #{product_price}, null)
mapper.select: SELECT AUCTION_NO, AUCTION_TYPE_NO, NICKNAME, AUCTION_STATUS_NO, AUCTION_TITLE, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMG, AUCTION_HITS,END_DATE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM,AUCTION_NO, AUCTION_TYPE_NO, NICKNAME, AUCTION_STATUS_NO, AUCTION_TITLE, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMG, AUCTION_HITS,END_DATE FROM( SELECT AUCTION_NO, AUCTION_TYPE_NO, NICKNAME, AUCTION_STATUS_NO, AUCTION_TITLE, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_IMG, AUCTION_HITS,END_DATE FROM AUCTION WHERE AUCTION_TYPE_NO=#{auctionType} AND AUCTION_STATUS_NO=1) WHERE ROWNUM < #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow}

SELECT AUCTION_NO, AT.AUCTION_TYPE_NO, NICKNAME, AST.AUCTION_STATUS_NO, PRODUCT_NAME, AUCTION_TITLE, AUCTION_CONTENT, PRODUCT_PRICE, BIDDING_UNIT, TO_CHAR(CREATED_AT,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS CREATE_STR, TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AS END_STR, AUCTION_HITS, PRODUCT_IMG, CURRENT_PRICE, AST.AUCTION_STATUS_NAME, AT.AUCTION_TYPE_NAME, END_DATE, HIGH_BIDDER FROM AUCTION A JOIN AUCTION_STATUS AST ON(A.AUCTION_STATUS_NO=AST.AUCTION_STATUS_NO) JOIN AUCTION_TYPE AT ON(A.AUCTION_TYPE_NO=AT.AUCTION_TYPE_NO) WHERE AUCTION_NO=#{auction_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE AUCTION SET AUCTION_STATUS_NO=3 WHERE SYSDATE >= END_DATE
UPDATE AUCTION SET AUCTION_STATUS_NO=3 WHERE AUCTION_NO=#{auction_no} AND (SYSDATE >= END_DATE)
mapper.select: SELECT BID_NO, A.AUCTION_NO, HIGH_BIDDER AS BIDDER_NICKNAME, A.NICKNAME AS SELLER, B.BID_PRICE AS FINAL_BID_PRICE FROM AUCTION A JOIN BIDS B ON(A.AUCTION_NO=B.AUCTION_NO) WHERE (AUCTION_STATUS_NO=3) AND (HIGH_BIDDER IS NOT NULL) AND (NOT A.AUCTION_NO IN(SELECT AUCTION_NO FROM TRADE)) AND (HIGH_BIDDER = B.NICKNAME)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM AUCTION WHERE AUCTION_TYPE_NO=#{auctionType} AND AUCTION_STATUS_NO=1
